name: Super Ninja Boy Run Premium
description:
Super Ninja Boy Run is a one-button platform game where it's impossible to get stuck in a level. You play 6 mini levels randomly selected from the 120 levels available. If you die in one level, you will automatically go to the next level, there is no penalty.

Develop your reflexes, but also your memory for the position of the gold coins. Finish each level with the 3 gold coins to progress. Each level has an alternate version with new gold coins for a total of 240 levels. The frequency of appearance of a level decreases when you catch the 3 gold coins. In this way, you can focus on the remaining levels.

Once the game is over, the number of tries is sent with Game Center. You will be able to check if you did better than your friends.

If the game becomes too difficult, you can restart the game with all levels from the beginning. Go to the game settings (button with a gear) and use the button start again with the gold coins.
